about_the_game:
Stellar Voyager is a game that explores space and collects money through battles and trade.

●Exploring
Explore a vast universe and discover new planets.
There are many planets in the universe.
There may be something we have not found yet.

●Battle
There are outlaws all over the universe aiming at you.
If you defeat them, you can earn rewards.

●Upgrade Ship
You can upgrade your own ship on the planet
Buying and equip the equipments for your purposes, such as combat, trade, and exploration, will make the game easier.

●Trading
In the planet's market, trading is possible.
Depending on the level of technology in each planet, the availability and price of the products will vary.
By understanding the characteristics of each planet and judging which planet to buy and sell, you can create tremendous trading profits.
Pioneer your own trade route.

●Develop Planet
Constructing various facilities on the planet can earn regular returns.
Depending on the type of facilities built, the level of technology in the field is rising and accordingly the prices of goods related to the field are fluctuating.
You can increase profits by building a facility that is favorable to trade.

Space sheriff fighting outlaws.
King of inter planet trade.
Investor who contribute to the development of the planets.
The choice is yours.

Good luck.


Features
- Open World consisting of more than 120 planets
- Ship Upgrade with more than 100 devices
- Real-time changing economic system
- Free sandbox game progression
- High-quality visuals including Detailed 3D models and breath-taking Special FX
- Magnificent orchestral soundtrack


How to control

- Keyboard & Mouse
Move : W,A,S,D
Fire : Mouse Left Click
Open Map : TAB
Autocruise : Q
Overdrive : E or Mouse Right Click

- Game Controller
Move : Left Stick
Fire : Right Stick
Open Map : Y or △
Autocruise : LB or L1
Overdrive : RB or R1

Buying and equip the equipments for your purposes, such as combat, trade, and exploration, will make the game easier.

name: Stella Voyager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 256MB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 512MB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Open World Space Exploring Trading Shmup RPG. Space sheriff fighting outlaws. King of inter planet trade. Investor who contribute to the development of the planets. The choice Is yours.
